languages.text: "Раньше я наставлял учеников-ткачей. Теперь наставляю мирян. Это... иначе. Тревожнее. Но это красивый танец".
"I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."
languages.original_text: "Раньше я наставлял учеников-ткачей. Теперь наставляю мирян. Это... иначе. Тревожнее. Но это красивый танец".

traits.locale_text: "I used to mentor weaver disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is… different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."
"I used to mentor weaver disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is… different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."
"I used to mentor weaver disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is… different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."
"I used to mentor weaver disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is… different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."
"I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."
"I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."

languages.text: "Ich habe die Schüler des Netzes betreut. Nun betreue ich Laien. Das ist ... anders. Beunruhigender. Aber es bleibt ein wunderschöner Tanz."
languages.original_text: "I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Schüler des Netzes betreut. Nun betreue ich Laien. Das ist ... anders. Beunruhigender. Aber es bleibt ein wunderschöner Tanz."

languages.text: «Antes instruía a discípulos de la Red. Ahora me dedico a orientar a los laicos. Es... diferente. Más inquietante, quizá. Pero sigue siendo una bella danza».
languages.original_text: "I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."

traits.locale_text: «Antes instruía a discípulos de la Red. Ahora me dedico a orientar a los laicos. Es... diferente. Más inquietante, quizá. Pero sigue siendo una bella danza».

languages.text: 「以前はウェブのディサイプルを指導していました。今は平信徒の指導を。そのふたつは…違うものです。落ち着かない。しかも、なおも美しい舞だ」
languages.original_text: "I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."

traits.locale_text: 「以前はウェブのディサイプルを指導していました。今は平信徒の指導を。そのふたつは…違うものです。落ち着かない。しかも、なおも美しい舞だ」

languages.text: “我曾为织网者教徒提供指引，如今负责指引教外人士。我的职责……发生了变化，更加令人不安，但依然是美妙的舞蹈。”
languages.original_text: "I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."

traits.locale_text: “我曾为织网者教徒提供指引，如今负责指引教外人士。我的职责……发生了变化，更加令人不安，但依然是美妙的舞蹈。”

languages.text: « Moi qui avais l'habitude de guider des disciples de la Toile, voilà que je suis chargé d'instruire des profanes. C'est... différent. Plus déstabilisant. Mais la danse n'en est pas moins belle. »
languages.original_text: "I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."

traits.locale_text: « Moi qui avais l'habitude de guider des disciples de la Toile, voilà que je suis chargé d'instruire des profanes. C'est... différent. Plus déstabilisant. Mais la danse n'en est pas moins belle. »

languages.text: "Eskiden Ağ'ın müritlerine mentorluk yapardım. Artık avama mentorluk yapıyorum. Bu... Farklı bir tecrübe. Daha rahatsızlık verici. Ama yine de güzel bir dans."
languages.original_text: "I used to mentor the Web's disciples. Now I mentor laypeople. It is... different. More unsettling. But it is a beautiful dance still."
